itemDisplayName: Deploy Drupal with VM Scale Set & AutoScale
description: Deploy a VM Scale Set behind a load balancer/NAT & each VM running an Apache/PHP app that eats CPU cycles. With Autoscale configured Scale Set will scale out & in as needed
summary: Deploys a VM Scale Set of Linux VMs behind a load balancer with NAT rules for ssh connections. Each VMs run a Apache/PHP application that can trigger Auto scaling activity based on defined rules
